docket_entries.description: MINUTE entry before the Honorable John J. Tharp, Jr: Upon receipt of the plaintiff's notice of voluntary dismissal [28] pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 41(a)(1)(A)(i), this case is dismissed with prejudice. All future hearings and deadlines are stricken; all pending motions are denied as moot. Civil case terminated. Mailed notice (lxs, )
NOTICE of Voluntary Dismissal by Kate Koval (Chatman, Celetha)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable M. David Weisman: In light of the notice of voluntary dismissal [28], all matters relating to the referral of this case having been resolved, this matter is returned to the District Judge. Status hearing set for 5/18/17 before Magistrate Judge Weisman is hereby stricken with no appearance required. Referral terminated. Mailed notice (ao,)
Notice of Settlement by Kate Koval (Chatman, Celetha)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable M. David Weisman: Based on the notice of settlement [26], the status hearing set for 4/19/17 is stricken and reset to 5/18/17 at 9:15 a.m. If a stipulation of dismissal is filed prior to that date, the status hearing will be stricken and no appearance will be necessary. Mailed notice (ao,)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable M. David Weisman: This case has been referred to Magistrate Judge Weisman for the purposes of discovery scheduling and supervision, as well as any settlement conference the parties may desire. Initial status hearing set for 4/19/17 at 9:15 a.m. An initial status report is required and shall be filed on or before 4/13/17. Mailed notice (ao,)

MEMORANDUM Opinion and Order: For the reasons stated in the accompanying Memorandum Opinion and Order, Defendant's motion to dismiss [17] is denied. This case is referred to Magistrate Judge Weisman for discovery scheduling and supervision, as well as any settlement conference the parties may desire. Signed by the Honorable John J. Tharp, Jr on 4/5/2017.Mailed notice(air, )
docket_entries.short_description: Order on Motion to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim

docket_entries.description: Pursuant to Local Rule 72.1, this case is hereby referred to the calendar of Honorable M. David Weisman for the purpose of holding proceedings related to: discovery scheduling and supervision, as well as any settlement conference.(air, )Mailed notice.
RESPONSE by Harris & Harris, Ltd.in Support of MOTION TO DISMISS FOR FAILURE TO STATE A CLAIM[17] (Weller, Jennifer)
RESPONSE by Plaintiff Kate Koval to Motion to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim[17] (Chatman, Celetha)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable John J. Tharp, Jr:Status hearing held. The Defendants Motion to Dismiss [17] is taken under advisement. Plaintiff's response to the motion is due by 12/22/16; Defendant's reply is due by 1/5/17. Parties are to exchange Rule 26(a)(1) disclosures by 12/14/16. Otherwise, discovery is stayed pending ruling on the motion to dismiss. Mailed notice (air, )
docket_entries.short_description: Order on Motion to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim

STATUS Report by Kate Koval (Chatman, Celetha)
MINUTE entry before the Honorable John J. Tharp, Jr:The initial status conference set for 11/18/16 is reset to 12/1/16 at 9 a.m. with the initial status report due 7 days prior. Mailed notice (air, )

MINUTE entry before the Honorable John J. Tharp, Jr:Motion hearing held. Plaintiff was not present for today's hearing. Defendant's Motion for Extension of Time to File Responsive Pleading or Alternatively to Stay Pending a Ruling in Cuenca [11] is granted in part. Defendant's response to Plaintiff's Complaint is due by 11/22/16. Mailed notice (air, )
docket_entries.short_description: order on motion for extension of time to file response/reply

docket_entries.description: NOTICE of Motion by Jennifer W. Weller for presentment of motion for extension of time to file response/reply, motion for relief[11] before Honorable John J. Tharp Jr. on 11/8/2016 at 09:00 AM. (Weller, Jennifer)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable John J. Tharp, Jr:Defendant's unopposed motion for an extension of time to answer or otherwise plead [7] is granted. Defendant's answer is due 11/1/16. No appearance on the motion is required. The initial status conference scheduled for 11/4/16 is reset to 11/18/16 at 9:00 a.m. with the initial status report due 11/10/16. Mailed notice (air, )

SUMMONS Returned Executed by Kate Koval as to Harris & Harris, Ltd. on 9/20/2016, answer due 10/11/2016. (Chatman, Celetha)

MINUTE entry before the Honorable John J. Tharp, Jr:The initial status conference in this matter is set for 11/4/16 at 9:00 a.m. The parties are directed to review the procedures and requirements for this conference on Judge Tharp's web site, which may be accessed at [www.ilnd.uscourts.gov/judges] and to submit the required Initial Status Report by 10/28/16. Mailed notice (air, )
